title: [Proposal] Mint 3000 LPOP tokens for community allocation
body:
HaloDAO (HALO) has seen strong user adoption from its inception to its launching. The team is rewarding community participation with LPOP tokens.

Breakdown for LPOP rewards are as follows:

Events - Total Allocation

Community Call Participation - 1,260 LPOP
Design Feedback Form Participation - 470 LPOP
AMA LPOP Question Winners - 3,610 LPOP
Twitter Campaign Winners - 1,000 LPOP
Referral Program Winners - 1,750 LPOP
KYC Participants - 19,000 LPOP
Specification:

In line with this, the team will be minting 30,000 LPOP tokens on June 30, 2021.

The goal is to vote for this proposal and begin incentives on June 30, 2021.
author: 0x30Ca8F1e13978a7A819af012665CFa7E49F1c554
